text: Love That Brute is a 1950 American crime comedy movie. It was directed by Alexander Hall. It is a remake of the 1941 movie Tall, Dark and Handsome. It stars Paul Douglas, Jean Peters, Cesar Romero, and Keenan Wynn. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1950 crime movies Category:1950 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movie remakes Category:American crime movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Alexander Hall Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies set in the 1920s
title: Love That Brute
